lines.text: If you want to be cool, first you pull your headband into the cool position. then you just lean back, put this hand in your pocket and then you wave this hand behind you like you just cut one and your trying to shoo away the stinch.
Hey Man, whaaas sappening?
Hey Miester! I like your sister.
Where were you born?
What?
Read my lips, El Paco. Where were you born?
I was born in East L.A., man.
Sure, sure. If you were born in East L.A., then who's the president of the United States?
I-I don't know, that guy, that guy who was on T.V., the guy in the cowboy hat... he used to be on "Death Valley Days"... uh, John Wayne!
Get him out of here.
That quarter's coming out of your tab and the tacos are 2.50. They're usally 3, but I like you.
The president of the United States is Ronald "dickhead" Reagan!
What do we got here? Looks like a bean in a beanbag.
What are you guys in for?
The good times.
Fuck me? No. Fuck you!
When will my black Pugeot be ready!
Black Pugeot? I knew you wasn't a natural redhead!
Now these other ones here, these are OTMs. Other than Mexicans. They're Chinese Indians.
I don't know where you learned to speak English so good, Rudy Roo or Loopty Loo, or whatever your name is!
Hey man! You want any used lottery tickets? Lotteria? Hey man I like you, you can have em. Nah man, they went to Fresno! Fresno!
